pullrequest.title: fix inertia ratio reduction error with hardcoded ratio limit. check for violation of line criterion.  added test.

content.raw:
This patch will fix dynamics by preventing dynamics errors deviating from f=ma for certain combinations of inertia values and constraint directions as demonstrated by the 3-wheeled model (added as test in this PR).

In normal working models (e.g. Atlas, PR2, Baxter), the difference is not perceivable, unless we are operating in a regime where there is massive amounts of constraint violations (as exercised by this `SphereAtlasLargeError` test).  In which case, **transient of dynamics with large constraint violation** changes but the property being tested, namely robustness of algorithm to constraint violation, is not diminished.

This patch will fix dynamics by preventing dynamics errors deviating from f=ma for certain combinations of inertia values and constraint directions as demonstrated by the 3-wheeled model (added as test in this PR).

In normal working models (e.g. Atlas, PR2, Baxter), the difference is not perceivable, unless we are operating in a regime where there is massive amounts of constraint violations (as exercised by this SphereAtlasLargeError test). In which case, transient of dynamics with large constraint violation changes but the property being tested, namely robustness of algorithm to constraint violation, is not diminished.
